body_html:
Hi,

Please use the forum to ask questions.

The problem is that if y's value is needed by some operation to compute the backward pass, then you will see this error if you try to modify it inplace. And += is doing an inplace change.
body_text:
Hi,
Please use the forum to ask questions.
The problem is that if y's value is needed by some operation to compute the backward pass, then you will see this error if you try to modify it inplace. And += is doing an inplace change.
body:
Hi,

Please use the [forum](https://discuss.pytorch.org/) to ask questions.

The problem is that if y's value is needed by some operation to compute the backward pass, then you will see this error if you try to modify it inplace. And `+=` is doing an inplace change.
